dalserver

Class KeywordTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • dalserver.KeywordTable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable

    public class KeywordTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable
    KeywordTable implements a simple keyword-value keyword table. This can be used, for example, to read a sequence of "keyword = value" formatted lines from a text file or input stream, and subsequently iterate through the resulting keyword table, or retrieve individual keywords by name.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeywordTable()
      Null constructor to generate a new keyword factory.
      KeywordTable(java.io.BufferedReader reader)
      Construct a new keyword dictionary from the contents of the given input stream.
      KeywordTable(java.lang.String text)
      Construct a new keyword dictionary from the contents of an input string containing multiple lines of text.

    • Constructor Detail

      • KeywordTable

        public KeywordTable()
        Null constructor to generate a new keyword factory.

      • KeywordTable

        public KeywordTable(java.lang.String text)
        Construct a new keyword dictionary from the contents of an input string containing multiple lines of text. Each line must contain a single keyword-value pair in the format "keyword = value" where value extends to the end of the line. Blank lines and comment lines are ignored. Section context markers ("[
        ]") are ignored at present.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to be processed.

      • KeywordTable

        public KeywordTable(java.io.BufferedReader reader)
        Construct a new keyword dictionary from the contents of the given input stream. Each line must contain a single keyword- value pair in the format "keyword = value" where value extends to the end of the line. Blank lines and comments lines are ignored. Section context markers ("[
        ]") are ignored at present.
        Parameters:
        reader - A BufferedReader for the stream to be read.
